bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Illness Sign of a trickling of small quantities of blood from the vaginal tract that every now and then has a turbid appearance. This term may also refer to such type of bleeding from other body parts. Yao xing lun 藥性論 Substance Entry sang ji sheng 桑寄生：主懷妊漏血不 止 , “It controls incessantly leaking blood during pregnancy”.
② Pathological Condition identical with lou xia 漏下 , leaking discharge. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 38: 漏血脈浮， 不可治也 , “Cases of leaking blood with a surface [movement in the] vessels cannot be cured”.
